Color Property¶

class ColorProperty.ColorProperty(points, rgb)[source]¶

Attributes

Points Holds the points dataset
RGB Points’ colors, ranging 0-255 (integers)
Raster Holds raster dataset
Size Return the size of the property
rgb Points’ colors, ranging 0-1 (floats)

Methods
